title: "Worksheet"
format: html

---

Load Data
```{r}
library(readr)
Ski_to_Sea_Data <- read_csv("module/Ski_to_Sea_Data.csv")
View(Ski_to_Sea_Data)
```

Correlation Matrix
```{r}
# Select specific variables
selected_data <- Ski_to_Sea_Data[, c("overall_minutes", "canoe_minutes", "xcski_minutes", "downhill_minutes", "kayak_minutes", "roadbike_minutes", "run_minutes", "xcbike_minutes")]

# Compute correlation matrix
cor(selected_data)
```

```{r}
ggplot(selected_data, aes(x = canoe_minutes, y = kayak_minutes)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(x = "Canoe", y = "Kayak)", title = "Comparison of Completion Times") +
  theme_minimal()
```
